title: The Municipal Commissioner shall constitute a Technical Committee for high rise buildings to advise on issues related to high-rise building having height more than 120 m
clause_text: The Municipal Commissioner shall constitute a Technical Committee for high rise buildings to advise on issues related to high-rise building having height more than 120 m. or any building having slenderness ratio 9 or more irrespective of height of building, in which following persons shall be included: Retired IAS officer not below rank of Principal Secretary -Chairman Structural Engineering faculty from IIT/VJTI/SPCE - Member
